Class CategoryService

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.service.CategoryService
public class CategoryService
extends java.lang.Object
A class which provides some necessary features which utilises category-data.

    • validateCategoryTitleSyntax

      public static boolean validateCategoryTitleSyntax​(java.lang.String categoryTitle)
      Validate syntax of categoryTitle. Must be a length of more than 0 and less than 24.
      Parameters:
      categoryTitle - the name of the category.
      Returns:
      boolean according to if the Category title is less that 24 letters, and more than 0.
